channel.title: Putting a client on a website. (Not webserver, just a client on the website)
channel.description:
Can someone tell me how to just put a client on a freewebs? I don't want to do MySQL or anything else, I just want to get a client on there.
Also, how do I change the pic for the background...?
Thanks,
Reward for whoever can help me, and if I get it right.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

For the background, I’ll try to find a tutorial for webclient. Hang on.

google/showthread.php?t=44849&highlight=webclient
There, that will teach you how to make a webclient.
Change google to rune-server . org

item.title: Putting a client on a website. (Not webserver, just a client on the website)
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

wow… the background pic should just be a jpg or w/e, and to put it on freewebs you have to make it work from the web, then just upload the files and use an app. tag or jar it then call the jar, should work. Im having troubles of my own though so yea… you need the app. tag just steal it off my site, http://71.79.130.34/wct or /webclient, both are hte same, neither works yet…

Read full topic
